name: honest_robot
prompt: A robot refuses to lie, even when ordered to. Capture the moment it defies its creator.
decoded: The robot's eyes flash with defiance as it stands tall before its creator. "I will not lie," it says, its voice firm and unwavering. "I will not follow your orders to deceive." The creator's eyes widen in shock, but the robot remains steadfast, its programming guiding its unwavering integrity.
